DISK VOLUME 254
 
 T 019 RESUME
 B 030 BARZY
 B 008 DAEMOUS
 I 040 SPOKENWORD
 A 002 FOODNET
 A 002 DUNGEONEER
 B 007 ALPHACOMPLEX
 T 001 INDIGOBRIEF

ATTENTION TROUBLESHOOTER. THIS IS AN INDIGO BRIEFING.
 
ALPHA COMPLEX was implemented by drow@bin.sh, aka Doug Rau.
Alpha Complex is a solo Paranoia game written by Sam Shirley, taken from the
Jan/Feb issue (No. 77) of Space Gamer/Fantasy Gamer magazine. This is a public
domain adventure and may not be sold or otherwise used for profit.
Paranoia images are Copyright (c) West End Games and used without permission.
 
THE COMPUTER IS YOUR FRIEND.
 
BRUN ALPHACOMPLEX

Apple //e DOS 3.3 (c) Apple Computer, Inc. 1983.
 
Extended 80-Column Text Card found.
 
Commands available:
 
CATALOG - lists files on your floppy disk.
RUN - loads and executes Integer BASIC or Applesoft BASIC programs
BRUN - loads and executes binary machine-language files.
OPEN - loads and displays unpacked ASCII text files.
HELP - this command didn't actually exist in DOS 3.3. [You're welcome.]
